name: Requin & Co
description:
You are a hungry shark ! Eat the octopus to increase you score but watch out for the crabs, they'll hurt you !

In this game i was a graphic designer, i worked on the crab and the UI.

This game is originally a game develop by some secondary school student, we made it better on every point. So we could use it at a base to teach them about Video Game development.

This was made entirely using Java Scripts, and I've used illustrator.
